mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(erai.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS create_time, erai.rate_type AS rate_type_int, erai.content FROM erp_record_info eri LEFT JOIN `erp_rate_info` erai ON eri.`rate_id` = erai.id WHERE eri.hospital_id = #{hospitalId, jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT id,name,departmentName,rateType,recordValidityDate from erp_rate_info where hospital_id = #{hospitalId, jdbcType=INTEGER} and rate_type = #{rateType, jdbcType=INTEGER} order by create_time desc limit 0,1

SELECT eri.id, ehi.name, erai.department_name AS departmentName, erai.rate_type AS rateType, CONCAT(eri.`start_date`,' ~ ',eri.`end_date`) AS recordValidityDate FROM (SELECT * FROM erp_rate_info GROUP BY hospital_id ORDER BY create_time DESC) erai LEFT JOIN `erp_record_info` eri ON eri.`rate_id` = erai.id LEFT JOIN `erp_hospital_info` ehi ON ehi.id = eri.`hospital_id` WHERE eri.`check_status` = 1 AND eri.`company_id` = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
